ValidationRule.description: Prevents closure of parent case in "Child Case Missing Info" status - even though the Child Case Opened/Closed counters may have equal values.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND ( ISCHANGED( Status ) , ISPICKVAL(Status, "Resolved"), (ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(Status), "Child Case Missing Info")))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: One or more child cases is missing info and needs to be fully resolved before this case can be closed
